boardgame.name: Trove: The Crystal Caverns
Vast: As Cavernas de Cristal
Vast: Die Kristallhöhlen
Vast: Las Cavernas Cristalinas
Vast: Le Caverne di Cristallo
Vast: The Crystal Caverns
boardgame.description: The dragon has been asleep for many long years. In that time, the cave under which it slumbered has changed greatly_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip;Goblins and strange monsters have filled its gloomy depths and there are whispers that the cave itself has begun thinking, shifting, and growing evermore dangerous._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Still, stories of peril rarely overshadow the rumors of riches. And riches there may be_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip; For where a dragon slumbers, there also lies a fiercely guarded treasure. Fortunately for the slumbering beast, malevolent crystals fill the cave_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s rooms with spectral light, hiding the entrance to the immeasurable treasure trove. Many have given their lives to the search and over the years the rumors have faded to legend._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But the most courageous adventurers will not be discouraged by bloodshed. On this day, a knight steps into the darkness, her gloved hand gripping the hilt of her sword. Her years of quests--all of the victories and defeats--have led to this one final adventure. Knowing the kingdom can never truly be at peace with the dragon beneath the cave, she has come to make a final stand. Little does she know that she will awake everything that slumbers in the shadows_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip; and begin the final battle in the darkness._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Enter the world of Vast: The Crystal Caverns!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Vast takes you and your friends into the torch light of a classic cave-crawling adventure, built on the concept of total asymmetry. Gone are days of the merry band of travelers fighting off evil. In Vast, you will become part of a new legend... Any part you wish!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Play as the classic, daring Knight, the chaotic Goblin horde, the colossal, greedy Dragon, or even the Cave itself _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; powerful, brooding, and intent on crushing the living things that dare to disturb its gloomy depths. Each role has its own powers, pieces, and paths to victory...and there can be only one winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As the ultimate asymmetric board game, Vast: The Crystal Caverns provides a limitless adventure, playable again and again as you and your friends explore the four different roles in different combinations. Play one-on-one in a race to the death between the Knight and the Goblins, or add in the Dragon and the Cave for deeper and more epic experiences, different every time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is an open but unpunched, like new, copy of the first edition. It is missing the 14 red cubes for the Dragon player role (this is how it was shipped from the factory to me). The color of the cubes do not matter--any small to medium cubes would work (they are put on the Dragon player board to track progress)--so if you have any spare cubes around you could substitute those.

This is a fantastic set. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re getting the fruit of my labors here in addition to the games. First off, you get these games: Vast: The Crystal Caverns Vast: The Fearsome Foes Expansion Vast: Bonus Cards Expansion You also get: 1. Homemade FAQ sheet for all 5 original roles + Terrain (see pic above) 2. Homemade Setup Guides for all 5 original roles (see pic above) 3. Most cards sleeved (did not sleeve the Fearsome Foes cards) 4. Components bagged and organized PLEASE NOTE: After I swapped in the upgraded cards and components, I threw out all the 1st edition cards and components. Also, my copy of Fearsome Foes did not come with player reference sheets, and I believe that is the case for all copies (the picture of the components in the images section does not show any player reference sheets; just rulebooks). Rulebook and Character information sheets are medium cardboard stock. Character playmats are thick cardboard stock and laminated.

I will offer a discount for the whole Vast set if you are interested in buying the whole lot which includes Vast the game and: 1) The Miniatures Expansion 2) The Fearsome Foes 3) Bonus Cards I will ship in the USA using USPS. I will send it as cheaply as possible. Do not ask for a shipping estimate. I am not making two trips to the post office. Shipping costs will likely be between $10-15 dollars. I will send elsewhere to the world. Do not expect the shipping to be cheap although I will send it as cheaply as possible. Sending games to Pacific nations seems to be more expensive than Europe. Nonetheless, do not expect world-wide shipping to be inexpensive. Note: If you make an order and do not pay me and then fail to contact me as to why you have not paid me, I will give you a negative rating. I am taking the time to go to the post office and get you an estimate. I am sending the game as cheaply as possible. Please be an honest buyer.
